useCase.name: Create Access Derivatives

preconditions.precondition: Archivist selects digital objects for derivative creation
Authorization is checked before derivative creation

successEndConditions.condition: Derivatives successfully created and metadata updated

failureEndConditions.condition: Failure to create derivatives or update metadata

useCase.trigger: Archivist triggers the creation of access derivatives

mainSequence.step: Archivist selects digital objects for derivative creation
Object Management System processes selected objects
Derivative Creation System creates access derivatives
Metadata System updates metadata with derivative details
Derivative Creation System sends success notification
Notification System notifies archivist of successful creation
